Test Steps: Open the extension.
Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to Unlock the wallet.
Expected Result:
The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
Proceed to Connect with MetaMask.
Connect with the current account.
Deploy the NFT contract.
Confirm the transaction and wait for the it to complete.
Proceed to Mint an NFT.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Close the test dapp and switch back to the wallet.
Open the activity list item.
Expected Result: The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
Notes: Take a note of the Contract address.

Test Steps: Close the block explorer and switch back to the wallet.
Switch to the NFTs tab.
Proceed to the Import tokens flow.
Enter the contract address.
Enter the token id.
Confirm the addition of the custom token.
Expected Result:
The NFT is shown in the wallet's NFTs list.
The NFT image is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to open the NFT.
Expected Result:
The NFT details page is shown.
The NFT collection name is shown.
The NFT token id is shown.
The NFT description is shown.
The NFT image source is shown.
The NFT contract address is shown.

Test Steps: Open the asset menu.
Proceed to view the asset on Opensea.
Expected Result: Opensea opens in a new tab.

Test Steps: Close Opensea and switch back to the wallet.
Navigate to the overview page using the asset breadcrumbs.
